# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (horizon tables) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.casework tables)
- **New Data:** where an main Reference in the source does not exist in the target, then NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on Reference Fields in source and in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an Reference info in the target exists but the same identifyers don't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View casework_nsip_redactions_dim is created

%%sql
-- Build casework_nsip_redactions_dim table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_nsip_redactions_dim_new

     AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT DISTINCT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.case_reference IS NULL
        THEN T3.NSIPRedactionsID
        ELSE NULL
    END                             AS NSIPRedactionsID,
    T1.case_reference               AS CaseReference,
    T1.num_redactions               AS NumberOfRedactions,
    T2.SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from)  AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                            AS ValidTo,
    md5(
        concat(
            IFNULL(T1.case_reference,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.case_reference,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.num_redactions,'.')
        ))                          AS RowID, -- this hash should contain all the defining fields
    'Y'                             AS IsActive,
    T3.IsActive                     AS HistoricIsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.horizon_nsip_redactions T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "Casework" = T2.Description AND T2.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_redactions_dim T3 ON T1.case_reference = T3.CaseReference AND T3.IsActive = 'Y'
WHERE
    -- flags new data        
    (CASE
        WHEN T1.case_reference = T3.CaseReference AND md5(
            concat(
                IFNULL(T1.case_reference,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.case_reference,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.num_redactions,'.')
            )) <> T3.RowID  -- same record, changed data
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN T3.CaseReference IS NULL -- new record
        THEN 'Y'
    ELSE 'N'
    END  = 'Y' )
    AND T1.case_reference IS NOT NULL
    AND T1.expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM odw_standardised_db.horizon_nsip_redactions)
;

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **casework_all_appeals_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View casework_nsip_redactions_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql
-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_nsip_redactions_dim_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 
SELECT 
    NSIPRedactionsID,
    CaseReference,
    NumberOfRedactions,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive

From casework_nsip_redactions_dim_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'
SELECT
    NSIPRedactionsID,
    CaseReference,
    NumberOfRedactions,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
    
FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_redactions_dim
WHERE CaseReference IN (SELECT CaseReference FROM casework_nsip_redactions_dim_new WHERE NSIPRedactionsID IS NULL) AND IsActive = 'Y';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW Loading_month

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    IngestionDate AS IngestionDate,
    to_timestamp(date_sub(IngestionDate,1)) AS ClosingDate,
    'Y' AS IsActive

FROM casework_nsip_redactions_dim_new;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_nsip_redactions_dim_changed_rows_final

    AS

SELECT 
    NSIPRedactionsID,
    CaseReference,
    NumberOfRedactions,
    T1.SourceSystemID,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive,
    T2.ClosingDate
FROM casework_nsip_redactions_dim_changed_rows T1
FULL JOIN Loading_month T2 ON T1.IsActive = T2.IsActive

# View casework_nsip_redactions_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key (i.e. AllAppealsID), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_redactions_dim is updated

%%sql
-- merge into dim table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_redactions_dim AS Target
USING casework_nsip_redactions_dim_changed_rows_final AS Source

ON Source.NSIPRedactionsID = Target.NSIPRedactionsID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows

WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (
        NSIPRedactionsID,
        CaseReference,
        NumberOfRedactions,
        SourceSystemID,
        IngestionDate,
        ValidTo,
        RowID,
        IsActive)
    VALUES (
        Source.NSIPRedactionsID,
        Source.CaseReference,
        Source.NumberOfRedactions,
        Source.SourceSystemID,
        Source.IngestionDate,
        Source.ValidTo,
        Source.RowID,
        Source.IsActive)
     ;

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_redactions_dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new casework_nsip_redactions_dim

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_redactions_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY NSIPRedactionsID NULLS LAST) AS NSIPRedactionsID,
    CaseReference,
    NumberOfRedactions,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_redactions_dim;
